entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High zero.
